## ResolutionSession.getResolutionPath() method

Get the resolution path including bindings and injections, for example: `bindingA --> @ClassA[0] --> bindingB --> @ClassB.prototype.prop1 --> bindingC`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getResolutionPath(): string;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`string`
